item.title: CEOs and Encryption: The Questions You Need to Ask Your Experts
item.description: Authors: Wilton, Robin Published: March 2018 URL: https://www.internetsociety.org/blog/2018/03/ceos-encryption-questions-need-asking-experts-2/ Tags: 2010s Corporate Economic Impact Public Key Encryption Abstract: Barely a week passes without something in the news that reminds us of the critical role encryption plays in securing our data. It is a technology that protects so much of what we rely on, as individuals protecting our privacy, as companies securing our business assets and transactions, and as governments responsible for critical national â€¦
